name: Gladiators V2
author: estate [466-032-803]
notes:
Nothing special, just a simple Balance Build, I wish I had the third floodgate but it doesnt want to come my way  But the last victory was a glorious econ steal and I finished that phoenix player off with his own yaksha 
Also, I really like those Cosmic Cyclones, they come in really handy vs backrow heavy decks and those pesky burn decks
